0: TULSA -- Police are investigating a shooting in midtown Tulsa on Tuesday morning. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The incident was reported in the 4900 block of South Columbia around 9 a.m. Police said they received a report from a homeowner, who claimed to have shot and killed an intruder who was in the bathroom of the home. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The intruder, identified as Donald Stovall, was pronounced dead at the scene. Police have not said what kind of weapon was used in the shooting. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The address tied to this shooting had a similar incident happen in 2013, when a homeowner at the address shot at an intruder, who lived. The same homeowner, Charles Sweeney, was involved in both shootings.The 2 Works for You story from that incident is attached in the video player above.
